summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on July 5, 2019, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear before the grand jury on July 24, 2019, to testify and produce documents related to an investigation into alleged violations of federal sex trafficking and conspiracy statutes. The document includes a cover letter requesting confidentiality and an advice of rights form.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena as the Assistant United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, signing the cover letter and the subpoena itself.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear before the grand jury at the United States Courthouse in Manhattan to testify and produce evidence.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena was issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, New York
The Silvia I. Motto Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of an official criminal investigation into suspected felony violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 2421, 2422, 2423 (transportation for prostitution, coercion, and minors), and 371 (conspiracy).
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested the recipient voluntarily refrain from disclosing the existence of the subpoena to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.
The recipient is commanded to appear before the grand jury on July 24, 2019, at 10:00 a.m. at the U.S. Courthouse in Manhattan.
The document includes an 'Advice of Rights' form informing the recipient of their right against self-incrimination and right to counsel.
